title: Salomon Rondon leads well-wishes for Everton's James McCarthy
description: Current and former players have wished James McCarthy a speedy recovery after the Everton midfielder suffered a double leg break during his team's 1-1 draw with West Brom.
content: McCarthy is expected to have surgery on his leg on Monday after he broke his tibia and fibula colliding with West Brom's Salomon Rondon.Rondon, who was visibly upset after the incident, led the well-wishes for the Republic of Ireland international.Former Everton player Ross Barkley wished his old team-mate a speedy recovery.McCarthy's team-mates Theo Walcott and Ramiro Funes Mori wished him luck.West Brom players Kieran Gibbs and Grzegorz Krychowiak both witnessed the accident.Shane Duffy was gutted for his Republic of Ireland team-mate.Robbie Fowler also tweeted his regards.
